name: Plougshares Into Swords
description:
The Universe is a cold place, but we can make it a warm home.

Ploughshares Into Swords is an fan-made expansion for the Lancer TTRPG, focusing on a community aid network called Eden Rising.

It includes :

A new Manufacturer with core bonuses

7 new Frames

Several sub factions 

and a host of lore and randomised tables to assist in the creation of groups, settings and campaigns that include community led movements seeking to improve the lives of those around them.
